body:
See attached module file. Something is causing the "Configure options" string to wrap (size? It is nearly 900 characters). -DMATH_LIBS isn't anything LMOD knows what to do with, so loading elemental fails.

Used spack 819ceb4f6dc0bd6a3b68df28f54f19ca0ad368ae, which is current. Occurred on a spack version from month ago as well, don't know which.

Installed with `spack install elemental %gcc@4.9.3`, on ppc64le, tried to load with `spack load elemental`

Module file:
[module.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1732033/module.txt)
title: Configure options string not commented - incorrect module file generated for Elemental
